spatial_accuracy.notes: The generated 3D model bears no resemblance to the 2D floor plan. It is a completely different layout, room count, and structure. None of the rooms from the 2D plan are present in the 3D render. The 3D render shows a garage area and an open-concept living/dining/kitchen, which are not depicted in the source 2D plan. The 2D plan is of a second floor with 3 bedrooms, a bath, activity area, and a balcony. The 3D model presents a ground floor layout. This is a complete failure in structural and layout replication.

structural_fidelity.notes: While the cutaway view is correctly rendered (roof removed, interior visible), the model displays extreme hallucination, creating an entirely different structure and floor plan. UI/Annotation Cleanliness failed due to text/measurements in the 2D source, but this part of the rubric applies to the *generated* 3D model, which is clean. However, 'Presentation Context' is not fully met as there are shadows potentially extending to infinity.

furniture_mapping.notes: No furniture from the 2D floor plan (beds, bathroom fixtures) is present in the 3D model. The 3D model introduces new furniture (sofa, dining table, kitchen counters, a car) which are not in the source 2D plan.

aesthetic_quality.notes: The geometry style correctly uses low-poly, flat-shaded forms with solid colors and no textures. Lighting is soft, but shadows are quite distinct. The camera view is a perspective projection, not an isometric one, which is a critical failure. The model is not centered, and the zoom level could be better.

detected_errors.description: Entire room layout missing; the generated 3D model portrays a completely different floor plan than the 2D reference.
Hallucinated an entire different house layout not present in the 2D plan. All rooms in the 3D model are invented.
Not an isometric view (perspective distortion evident).
No furniture from the 2D plan is present; entirely new furniture introduced in different rooms.
Presence of a vehicle and garage, along with an open-plan kitchen and living area, are entirely new architectural features not in the 2D source.
Presentation Context not fully met; shadows extend to infinity and are not neutral/isolated.

summary: The 3D render is a complete failure in replicating the 2D floor plan, presenting an entirely different house layout and non-isometric camera view. It exhibits severe hallucination with no spatial or furniture correlation to the source.
